title: Moving
content:
It is entirely possible that due to family reasons I may be forced to move around late april. This will involve a big reloaction up north, away from the internet. This means that it is possible I will be unable to participate in the Keen community. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

I really don't know what else to say or anything, I just really hope that I don't have to go. But in the case that I must, I have prepared an internet wil to handle all of my online possesions and Keen stuff. It will be executed by my brother or Sarah, whoever has the most net acess at the time.

And no, this sin't an april fools joke, I am actually quite serious here if I'm lying I promise to make everyone an individualy tailored mod.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Nyaarg.
content:
For what duration shall we be with out the Lord if this unfortunate event doth transpire? Here's hoping all works out... Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

title: sdflj
content: ROFL! I forgot this was April Fools day.  But anyways, why would a relocation north cut you off from the internet? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]   I swear, any place without internet isn't waaaay backward.

title: Re: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!OOOOON :eR
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr] For what duration shall we be with out the Lord if this unfortunate event doth transpire? Here's hoping all works out...[hr][/quote]

A year minimum

[quote]Quote:[hr]But anyways, why would a relocation north cut you off from the internet? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] I swear, any place without internet isn't waaaay backward.[hr][/quote]

We're an island at the end of the earth; there are places that don't even have hot water here, I'll be 'up north' where there is little infrastructure.
[quote]Quote:[hr]
Let's remember all of the good times when LL was here...
[hr][/quote]

Yes, one of the best being when I was sick and couldn't annoy anyone!

title: Re: Moving
content:
